description: The terrible events of yesterday have brought almost every member of Lucky² down in the dumps. Upon the request of Takeo, everyone has to go out to an accessory shop in order to find the materials to craft their group bracelets with. Rina and Yuura take this trip as an opportunity to try and get rid of the clouds of sadness surrounding all the members of Lucky².

titles.title: キラキラ プレアデス
